advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Drift fast to beat all rivals!

name: Car Driving Master: Mega Ramp
artistName: Ngoc vinh trading service company limited

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

editorialNotes.standard: Eden Gamesâ€™ highly polished racer impresses us more each time we play. The cars handle beautifully, the scenic tracks are gorgeous, and these quick races are perfect for drivers on the go. Our favourite features? Maybe the ability to rewind time and undo brief mishapsâ€”or the deep customisation options that let you trick out your garage along with your rides.
